name: message_id
description: Each message is affixed with a unique number upon receipt by the Directorate of Fisheries.

name: message_type_code
description: Here only POS = Standard position message . Other message types have been removed.

name: timestamp_utc
description: Date and time in UTC of a message generated on board a vessel.

name: speed
description: The vessel's speed in tenths of a knot

name: callsign
description: The vessel's identification signal assigned by the Norwegian Maritime Directorate (Ship registers)

name: registration_mark
description: Registration mark consists of a maximum of 8 characters; 1-2 indicates the county letter (s), 3-6 a serial number, 7-8 indicates the municipality letter (s). A registration mark can be reused after a waiting period of two years. See the Business Permit Regulations §§ 13 and 22. Appears only for active fishing vessels.

name: vessel_name
description: The name of the vessel taken from the mark register for active fishing vessels. For inactive fishing vessels, at the time of notification, the last registered name is displayed. For other vessel types entered manually when registering fishery tracking.

name: length
description: The vessel's largest length in meters, measured from the leading edge of the front part of the hull to the stern edge of the aft part of the hull, cf. Regulations of 18 December 2009 no. 1694 on the measurement of ships § 2 letter l. For inactive fishing vessels at the time of notification, the last registered information is displayed. For vessel types other than fishing vessels entered manually when registering fishing tracking.

name: gross_tonnage_other
description: The vessel's gross tonnage measured according to rules other than the London Convention 1969. For fishing vessels taken from the Register of Marks. For inactive fishing vessels at the time of notification, the last registered information is displayed. For vessel types other than fishing vessels entered manually when registering fishing tracking.

name: power_engine
description: Engine power stated in horsepower (HP). For fishing vessels taken from the brand register. For inactive fishing vessels at the time of notification, the last registered information is displayed. For vessel types other than fishing vessels entered manually when registering fishing tracking.

name: vessel_type
description: Fishing vessels are stated in two categories where active fishing vessels are stated as «Fishing vessels (active)» and inactive fishing vessels at the time of notification are stated as only «Fishing vessels». For other vessel types, it is entered manually when registering fishery tracking.
